Member Function Documentation

Numbers_Words_ru.toWords ( $  num,
$  gender = 1 
)

Converts a number to its word representation in Russian language

Parameters:
integer $num An integer between -infinity and infinity inclusive :) that need to be converted to words
integer $gender Gender of string, 0=neutral, 1=male, 2=female. Optional, defaults to 1.
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation
private
Author:
Andrey Demenev <demenev@on-line.jar.ru>

Reimplemented from Numbers_Words.

Numbers_Words_ru._toWordsWithCase ( $  num,
&$  case,
$  gender = 1 
)

Converts a number to its word representation in Russian language and determines the case of string.

Parameters:
integer $num An integer between -infinity and infinity inclusive :) that need to be converted to words
integer $case A variable passed by reference which is set to case of the word associated with the number
integer $gender Gender of string, 0=neutral, 1=male, 2=female. Optional, defaults to 1.
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation
private
Author:
Andrey Demenev <demenev@on-line.jar.ru>

Numbers_Words_ru._groupToWords ( $  num,
$  gender,
&$  case 
)

Converts a group of 3 digits to its word representation in Russian language.

Parameters:
integer $num An integer between -infinity and infinity inclusive :) that need to be converted to words
integer $gender Gender of string, 0=neutral, 1=male, 2=female.
integer $case A variable passed by reference which is set to case of the word associated with the number
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation
private
Author:
Andrey Demenev <demenev@on-line.jar.ru>

Numbers_Words_ru.toCurrencyWords ( $  int_curr,
$  decimal,
$  fraction = false,
$  convert_fraction = true 
)

Converts a currency value to its word representation (with monetary units) in Russian language

Parameters:
integer $int_curr An international currency symbol as defined by the ISO 4217 standard (three characters)
integer $decimal A money total amount without fraction part (e.g. amount of dollars)
integer $fraction Fractional part of the money amount (e.g. amount of cents) Optional. Defaults to false.
integer $convert_fraction Convert fraction to words (left as numeric if set to false). Optional. Defaults to true.
Returns:
string The corresponding word representation for the currency
public
Author:
Andrey Demenev <demenev@on-line.jar.ru>
